trans-unit.source: Implements the basic functionality that represents the appearance and behavior of a table layout.
trans-unit.target: Implementa a funcionalidade básica que representa o aspeto e o comportamento de um esquema de tabela.

trans-unit.source: The TableLayoutStyle class is a common base class for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> classes, which describe the appearance and behavior of columns and rows, respectively, in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: A classe de TableLayoutStyle é uma classe base comum para as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>classes, que descrevem o aspeto e o comportamento das colunas e linhas, respetivamente, no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> e</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: The series of styles that represent the current columns and rows in the current table layout are aggregated in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: A série de estilos que representam as colunas atuais e as linhas do esquema de tabela atual é agregada num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection>, respetivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: Este é o construtor predefinido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle>

trans-unit.source: It effectively sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>.
Gets or sets a flag indicating how a row or column should be sized relative to its containing table.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um sinalizador que indica como uma linha ou coluna deve ser dimensionados de forma relativamente à respetiva tabela contentora.

trans-unit.source: The table layout engine sizes a row or column in one of the following ways: - In an absolute number of pixels (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>).
trans-unit.target: O motor de esquema de tabela tamanhos uma linha ou coluna de uma das seguintes formas: - num número absoluto de pixels (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>

trans-unit.source: - As a percentage of the parent container (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>).
trans-unit.target: -A como uma percentagem do contentor principal (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>

trans-unit.source: - To share equal space with its peers (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>).
trans-unit.target: -Para partilhar espaço igual com os respetivos parceiros (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SizeType"></xref> values that specifies how rows or columns of user interface (UI) elements should be sized relative to their container.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SizeType"> </xref> valores que especifica a forma como linhas ou colunas do utilizador interface elementos (IU) devem ser dimensionados de forma em relação ao respetivo contentor.
